name: Deel
description: Deel is built to scale with organizations of all sizes, from small teams to enterprises of thousands. Whether you want to hire worldwide without opening legal entities, streamline HR for your global team, or pay all types of workers anywhere with consolidated payroll Deel does it all with full compliance.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Deel is the all-in-one HR platform for global teams
ShortDescription: Deel’s the only HR platform with everything you need, for everyone

Highlights.name: Onboard in seconds
Highlights.description: Get your team set up with everything they need, like contracts, equipment, and way more

Highlights.name: Pay everyone
Highlights.description: Pay your employees and contractors in a few clicks, without unnecessary fees or hassle.

Highlights.name: Manage HR for anyone
Highlights.description: Simplify HR for your whole team with the only global-first HR platform for any worker.

enhanced_description: Deel is an all-in-one HR platform designed to scale with organizations of all sizes, from small teams to large enterprises. It enables global hiring without requiring local legal entities, streamlines HR operations for global teams, and offers consolidated payroll for all worker types worldwide, ensuring full compliance. Key functionalities include rapid onboarding with contract and equipment management, simplified global payroll for employees and contractors in a few clicks without unnecessary fees, and comprehensive HR management for any worker type.
key_use_cases: Global hiring without establishing local legal entities
Streamlining HR operations for global teams
Consolidated payroll for all worker types globally (employees and contractors)
Rapid onboarding processes (including contracts and equipment management)
Comprehensive HR management for diverse global workforces
competitive_advantages: Enables global hiring without the necessity of opening local legal entities
Provides a consolidated global payroll solution for diverse worker types
Ensures full compliance across global HR and payroll operations
Offers a comprehensive, all-in-one HR platform specifically designed for global teams
Simplifies global payments for employees and contractors, reducing fees and hassle
Built as a global-first HR platform
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Reduced administrative burden and operational costs through consolidated global payroll
Mitigation of compliance risks for international hiring and payroll
Significant time savings in onboarding processes
Cost savings and reduced administrative effort related to global payments
compliance_features: Ensures full compliance for global hiring, HR operations, and payroll processing
scalability_features: Built to scale with organizations of all sizes, from small teams to enterprises of thousands
Proven capacity to onboard over 500,000 workers globally
Designed as a global-first HR platform
